text: Mollinedia glabra is a species of plant in the Monimiaceae family. It is endemic to Brazil. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== * Peixoto, A.L. 1998. Mollinedia glabra. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. title: Mollinedia glabra
